reference.title: Distribution-specific information
reference.shortdesc: for provides support for the CEX7S feature since Release 7.1. In order to use the full set of Release 7.3, a distribution with support for the CEX7S feature is required.

section.p: For the most current distribution-specific information about Release 7.3, refer to the Release Notes from the 4769 Embedded Code Download pages. The contained information may be more up-to-date than this publication. To access these sites, you must obtain and log in with an IBMid.
7.3 is supported on the following distributions:

ul.li: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.9, 8.3 and later: CEX7C exploitation
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5, 15 SP2 and later: CEX7C exploitation

section.p: To exploit the full functionality of 7.3 on a CEX7S, you need an with a CEX7S installed. Thus, in addition to the listed distributions with CEX7C exploitation, you can also use distributions providing CEX7C toleration as documented in the previous Release 7.1 edition of this publication (SC33-8294-09).
section.note: Only 64-bit versions of this software are provided. 31-bit support is not provided.
